pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Energise & Rejuvenate Body Wash 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Give yourself a pat on the back! This bottle is made from recycled plastic and is also recyclable, which means you are helping to reduce our waste on this beautiful planet and we are all one step closer to sustainable living. Mother Nature thanks you!

Warnings

STORE AT BELOW 30°C.NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY.KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES.

Common Uses

The refreshing citrus notes of lemon, lime and bergamot are set against a delicate woody base of Cedarwood to invigorate and revitalise the senses for an ongoing energy boost.
Cruelty free, Australian made & owned, 97% natural ingredients, Cruelty free, Plastic made for consumer recycled plastic.

Ingredients

Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Decyl Glucoside, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Peel Oil, Cedrus Atlantica (Cedarwood) Wood Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil, Matricaria chamomilla (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance
